title: Looking for Gold/Plat ADC/Jung/Mid for duo last minute climb
body:
Currently Gold 3 and will be playing ALL of Friday (15th), some of Sunday (17th) and all of Monday (18th). Looking for a Gold/Plat player who has discord, understands the game and is not going to be aggressive or blame people. I main Support and can help carry the bot lane if you want to take Jungle/Mid. 

Last 20 games stats:
{{champion:89}} Leona = 69% win rate | 9-4 | (3.06KDA)
{{champion:267}} Nami = 100% win rate | 2-0 | (4.18KDA)
{{champion:40}} Janna = 0% win rate | 0-2 | (2.22KDA)

2019 stats:
{{champion:111}} Nautilus - 2.56KDA 53% win - 80 games
{{champion:89}} Leona - 2.74KDA 57% win - 65 games
{{champion:267}} Nami - 3.78KDA 62% win - 37 games
{{champion:497}} Rakan - 2.92KDA 43% win - 35 games
{{champion:117}} Lulu - 2.67KDA 47% win - 33 games

I was coached by a Master OCE Support player and play a lot and understand game mechanics, lane mechanics, objectives, snowballing, champion counters and ganking. 

Add my in-game un1que.

My objective is to get to Platinum 4 by end of day Monday. Currently Gold 3 29LP.

Need about 22 wins to progress {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

Let's go!

replies.body:
How about playing a carry lane/role?

Being coached by a Master OCE Support main doesn't mean shit. Climbing as a support out of low elo is generally a more tedious progression.

No matter how good of a support you are with mechanics, macro, vision, map awareness - you're solely relying on the other 4 to carry (even if you win your lane with your adc). That's solo queue and blind faith mixed with the coin toss of teams.

Low elo players generally lack game sense, macro, rotations and focus purely on micro mechanics and kills rather than objectives and CS. You also slow yourself down by duoing with someone as matchmaking becames more scuffed if you're asking to duo with someone in high gold and plat.

Play a carry lane/role that has a potential to impact greatly compared to support in low elo because you're asking to be carried.
